nodes.text: The Chonsetta system was a star system located in the Metatessu sector within the galaxy's Mid Rim which contained at least one comet. In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry—consisting of the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike, the Braha'tok-class gunship Apailana's Promise, and two X-wing starfighters—was attacked by around a dozen TIE interceptors of the Galactic Empire, which had followed a hypermatter leak from the Thunderstrike's hyperdrive. The TIEs, having been hidden away in a comet trail, ravaged the starboard side of the corvette before the 61st escaped. After the attack, the rebel company discovered how the Empire had tracked its vessels.
The Chonsetta system appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
